(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)go\.sum$
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.ai$
\.avi$
\.bmp$
\.bz2$
\.cabal$
\.crt$
\.DS_Store$
\.eot$
\.gif$
\.gitattributes$
\.graffle$
\.gz$
\.icns$
\.ico$
\.jar$
\.jpe?g$
\.key$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.ocf$
\.otf$
\.pdf$
\.pem$
\.png$
\.psd$
\.svg$
\.ttf$
\.wav$
\.woff2?$

\.zip$
^\.github/actions/spelling/
^\.github/linters/
^alloy/sd/examples_based_on_version_4/
^thesis/
^\QREADME.md\E$
^\Qtest/Spec.hs\E$
^\Qsrc/Example.hs\E$
^\Qsrc/Generate.hs\E$
^\Qsrc/Instance.hs\E$
^\Qsrc/Layout.hs\E$
